meanings.definition: One who engages in conversation or discussion.
meanings.sent1: The discourser shared their thoughts on the topic during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The group had a lively discussion with each discourser expressing their opinions.
meanings.sent3: The discourser joked about the weather, sparking laughter among the listeners.
meanings.sent4: As a skilled discourser, she wove captivating stories into her conversations.
meanings.sent5: The young discourser eagerly participated in the debate, eager to share their views.

meanings.definition: A person who delivers a speech or lecture.
meanings.sent1: The discourser captivated the audience with their powerful speech.
meanings.sent2: Each discourser at the event presented their unique perspective on the topic.
meanings.sent3: The discourser rehearsed their speech in front of the mirror, perfecting every gesture.
meanings.sent4: His words as a discourser resonated with the audience, leaving a lasting impact.
meanings.sent5: The discourser's passionate delivery inspired the listeners to take action.
